channel.title: ::Master command please, will rep
channel.description: Right, well i need a ::master command, so players can use it, everytime i add one, still only owners can use it.

item.title: ::Master command please, will rep
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:7, topic:430359”]I haven’t done anything with private servers in over half a year, so this is just something I ripped off a server that was on my desktop.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("master")) { if (c.inWild()) return; for (int j = 0; j < 7; j++) { c.playerXP[j] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[j] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[j]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(j); } }[/quote]
Perfect, cheers bro.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Master command please, will rep
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“mage pwns, post:5, topic:430359”]what source is it? if its a PI base try:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); } [/quote]
Errors from that;

item.title: ::Master command please, will rep
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

what source is it? if its a PI base try:

		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) {
		    for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
			c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
			c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
		    }
		    c.getPA().requestUpdates();
		}
